sense.def:
To retaliate
pomeni povzročiti škodo ali neprijetnosti nekomu, ki je povzročil škodo ali neprijetnosti nam.

cit.quote: maščevati se, vrniti milo za drago

seg.quote: ...the ability to retaliate during an attack.
They retaliated by changing the venue for the meeting.
It was agreed that immediate retaliation was necessary.
